snippet.title: Welcome to Maison Chichigami - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Deep in the mountains, there is said to be a legendary hot spring: called the Spirit Spring. Becoming lost on the way to the spring, you are rescued by a mysterious, reclusive family. But what secrets does this family hide away in their manor?

 Welcome to Maison Chichigami on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/welcome-to-maison-chichigami/

 Welcome to Maison Chichigami on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2914480/Welcome_to_Maison_Chichigami/
